    "@Entity",
    "@Id",
    "@GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY)",
    "public void addProjectCollaborator(List<CollaboratorEntity> collaborators) { this.collaborators.addAll(collaborators); }",
    "public boolean isCollaborator(Long userId) { return collaborators.stream().anyMatch(collaborator -> collaborator.getUser().getId().equals(userId)); }"
